name: Butler, Shine, Stern & Partners
description: Butler, Shine, Stern & Partners is one of the largest independent agencies on the West Coast. It’s known for providing highly creative, fully accountable marketing solutions to a broad array of partners including MINI Cooper, Blue Shield, Columbia, Sorel,  Nature Made, Greyhound, PNC and Allergan. Core services include integrated advertising, data analytics, digital marketing, communications planning, web development, brand identity, design and strategic brand consulting.
